home.title: ArbiNote ⚽
home.subtitle: ArbiNote centralizes Tunisian Ligue 1 referee ratings: seasons, matchdays, games, and live votes.
home.seasons.description: Browse the current season and review every matchday.
home.matches.description: Check the latest games and vote to rate referees.
home.rankings.description: Discover the best referee averages in real time.

home.howItWorks.step1: 1. Pick a matchday or a match to evaluate.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.section1.paragraph1: ArbiNote (hereinafter "we", "our", "the platform") is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our referee rating platform.
privacy.section1.paragraph2: By using ArbiNote, you agree to the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree to these practices, please do not use our service.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Data Collected
privacy.section2.paragraph1: We collect the following types of data when you use ArbiNote:
privacy.section2.list.item1: Device Identifier (Device Fingerprint): We use FingerprintJS to generate a unique identifier based on the technical characteristics of your device (browser, operating system, screen resolution, etc.). This identifier is used solely to prevent multiple votes and ensure the integrity of the rating process.
privacy.section2.list.item2: Voting Data: When you vote for a referee, we record your evaluation (scores by criterion, overall rating), the match identifier, the referee identifier, and your device identifier.
privacy.section2.list.item3: User Preferences: We store your language preferences (French, English, Arabic) and theme preferences (light/dark mode) in your browser via localStorage and cookies.
privacy.section2.list.item4: Active League: We store your active league selection in a cookie to improve your browsing experience.
privacy.section2.list.item5: Browsing Data: We automatically collect certain technical information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and pages visited to ensure the proper functioning of the platform.
privacy.section2.paragraph2: Important: We do not collect personally identifiable data such as your name, email address, phone number, or postal address.
privacy.section3.title: 3. Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy.section3.paragraph1: We use the following technologies to improve your experience:
privacy.section3.list.item1: Essential Cookies: "arbinote-locale" (language preference), "activeLeagueId" (selected league). These cookies are necessary for the platform to function.
privacy.section3.list.item2: LocalStorage: We store your theme preferences ("arbinote-theme"), language preference ("arbinote-locale"), and a local list of your votes ("note-arbitre-votes") to improve performance and your experience.
privacy.section3.list.item3: You can manage or delete these cookies and data through your browser settings. However, this may affect some platform features.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Use of FingerprintJS
privacy.section4.paragraph1: ArbiNote uses FingerprintJS (version 5.0.1), a third-party service that generates a unique identifier based on your device and browser characteristics. This technology is used exclusively to:
privacy.section4.paragraph2: Prevent Multiple Votes: Ensure that only one vote per match is recorded per device, thus preserving the integrity of statistics and rankings.
privacy.section4.note.title: Important Note:
privacy.section4.note.text: The identifier generated by FingerprintJS is not personally identifiable and cannot be used to identify you outside of the ArbiNote platform. We do not share this identifier with third parties for advertising or tracking purposes.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Use of Data
privacy.section5.paragraph1: We use your data for the following purposes:
privacy.section5.list.item1: Platform Operation: Manage the voting system, calculate statistics and rankings, and display results.
privacy.section5.list.item2: Experience Improvement: Remember your preferences (language, theme, league), personalize the display, and facilitate your navigation.
privacy.section5.list.item3: Security and Integrity: Detect and prevent fraud, multiple votes, and abuse to maintain the quality and reliability of data.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Data Sharing and Disclosure
privacy.section6.paragraph1: We are committed to not selling, renting, or sharing your data with third parties for commercial purposes. However, we may share certain information in the following cases:
privacy.section6.paragraph2: Anonymized Aggregated Data: Overall statistics (averages, rankings, trends) are public and accessible to all users. This data is anonymized and does not allow individual identification.
privacy.section6.list.item1: Service Providers: We may use third-party services (hosting, database) that have access to the technical data necessary for the platform to function. These providers are required to respect data confidentiality and security.
privacy.section6.list.item2: Legal Obligations: If required by law, we may disclose your information to competent authorities.
privacy.section6.list.item3: Protection of Our Rights: We may reveal information if necessary to protect our rights, property, or the security of our users.
privacy.section6.list.item4: With Your Consent: In any other case, we will only share your data with your explicit consent.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Data Security
privacy.section7.paragraph1: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data:
privacy.section7.list.item1: Encryption: Communications between your browser and our servers are encrypted via HTTPS.
privacy.section7.list.item2: Secure Database: Your data is stored in a secure MySQL database with restricted access.
privacy.section7.list.item3: Access Limitation: Only authorized administrators have access to data to ensure maintenance and technical support.
privacy.section8.title: 8. Your Rights
privacy.section8.paragraph1: In accordance with data protection laws (GDPR for EU residents), you have the following rights:
privacy.section8.paragraph2: Right of Access: You can request a copy of the data we hold about you. However, since we do not collect personally identifiable data, this access will be limited to technical data (device identifier, associated votes).
privacy.section8.paragraph3: Right to Deletion: You can request the deletion of your votes. Note that deleting a vote may affect already calculated statistics and rankings.
privacy.section9.title: 9. Data Retention Period
privacy.section9.paragraph1: We retain your data for the following periods:
privacy.section9.paragraph2: Votes: Your votes are retained indefinitely to maintain the history of statistics and rankings. However, you can request their deletion at any time.
privacy.section10.title: 10. Contact
privacy.section10.paragraph1: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us:
privacy.section10.paragraph2: We are committed to responding to your requests as soon as possible.
privacy.section10.contact.title: Contact:
privacy.section10.contact.email: For any request regarding your personal data, please contact the platform administrator via the contact form available on the website.
privacy.section11.title: 11. Policy Changes
privacy.section11.paragraph1: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to you via a notification on the platform.
privacy.section11.paragraph2: We encourage you to regularly consult this page to stay informed of our data protection practices.
privacy.footer: By continuing to use ArbiNote, you accept this privacy policy. If you do not accept these terms, please stop using our service.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.section1.paragraph1: These Terms of Service (hereinafter "Terms" or "Conditions") govern your use of the ArbiNote platform (hereinafter "the Platform", "we", "our").
terms.section1.paragraph2: By accessing ArbiNote or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not accept these Terms, you must not use the Platform.
terms.section1.paragraph3: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon their publication on the Platform. It is your responsibility to regularly review the Terms to be aware of any changes.
terms.section2.title: 2. Service Description
terms.section2.paragraph1: ArbiNote is an online platform that allows users to:
terms.section2.list.item1: View football matches and information about referees
terms.section2.list.item2: Vote and rate referees on different criteria (main referee, VAR, assistants)
terms.section2.list.item4: Access history of seasons, matchdays, and matches
terms.section3.title: 3. Terms of Use
terms.section3.paragraph1: By using ArbiNote, you agree to:
terms.section3.list.item1: Use the Platform legally and in accordance with these Terms
terms.section3.list.item2: Not attempt to manipulate, falsify, or tamper with votes or results
terms.section3.list.item3: Not use bots, automated scripts, or other means to vote fraudulently
terms.section3.list.item4: Respect the intellectual property rights and copyrights of the Platform and its content
terms.section3.paragraph2: Any breach of these Terms may result in the suspension or termination of your access to the Platform, without prior notice.
terms.section4.title: 4. Voting System
terms.section4.paragraph1: The following rules apply to the voting system:
terms.section4.list.item1: Only one vote per match and per device is allowed to ensure the integrity of statistics
terms.section4.list.item2: Voting is only possible if the match has started and at least 30 minutes have elapsed since the start of the match
terms.section4.list.item3: Once recorded, a vote cannot be modified or deleted by the user
terms.section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
terms.section5.paragraph1: All content on ArbiNote, including but not limited to: texts, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, are the property of ArbiNote or its content providers and are protected by international copyright laws.
terms.section5.paragraph2: You are not authorized to reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any content from the Platform without our prior written permission.
terms.section5.note.title: Exception:
terms.section5.note.text: Aggregated and anonymized statistical data (averages, rankings, trends) may be used for informational and analytical purposes, respecting intellectual property rights.
terms.section6.title: 6. Service Availability
terms.section6.paragraph1: We strive to ensure continuous availability of the Platform, but:
terms.section6.list.item1: We do not guarantee that the Platform will be accessible at all times, without interruption, error-free, or defect-free
terms.section6.list.item2: We reserve the right to temporarily interrupt access to the Platform for maintenance, updates, or any other technical or administrative reason
terms.section6.list.item3: We are not responsible for losses or damages resulting from the temporary unavailability of the Platform
terms.section6.list.item4: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue all or part of the Platform at any time, without prior notice
terms.section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
terms.section7.paragraph1: To the extent permitted by applicable law, ArbiNote will not be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the Platform.
terms.section7.paragraph2: Statistics, rankings, and data displayed on ArbiNote are provided "as is" for informational purposes. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of this information and are not responsible for decisions made based on this information.
terms.section8.title: 8. Personal Data Protection
terms.section8.paragraph1: The collection and processing of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is an integral part of these Terms.
terms.section8.list.item1: By using the Platform, you consent to the collection and processing of your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy
terms.section8.list.item2: You can review our Privacy Policy for detailed information on how we collect, use, and protect your data
terms.section8.list.item3: You have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, rectify, and delete, in accordance with applicable legislation
terms.section9.title: 9. Modification and Termination
terms.section9.paragraph1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate your access to the Platform at any time, without prior notice, for any reason, including in case of violation of these Terms.
terms.section9.paragraph2: You may stop using the Platform at any time. Termination of your use will not affect votes you have already submitted, which will remain in our database in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
terms.section10.title: 10. Contact and Complaints
terms.section10.paragraph1: For any questions, complaints, or requests regarding these Terms or the Platform, you can contact us:
terms.section10.contact.title: Contact:
terms.section10.contact.email: For any request regarding the Terms of Service, please contact the platform administrator via the contact form available on the website.
terms.section11.title: 11. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
terms.section11.paragraph1: These Terms are governed by the laws in force in the country where ArbiNote is hosted and operated. Any dispute arising from or related to these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of that country.
terms.section11.paragraph2: If a provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, that provision will be modified and interpreted to achieve the objectives of that provision to the extent possible, and the other provisions will remain in effect.
terms.footer: By using ArbiNote, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these Terms, please do not use our service.

legal.section3.contact: For any questions or requests regarding the platform, you can contact us:

legal.section4.providerValue: [To be completed with your hosting provider name]

legal.section5.title: 5. Data Processing Controller
legal.section5.paragraph1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the controller for personal data collected on ArbiNote is:
legal.section5.note: For any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, please consult our Privacy Policy or contact us directly.
legal.section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
legal.section6.paragraph1: All elements present on ArbiNote are protected by intellectual property law and belong to ArbiNote or its partners. The following are particularly protected:
legal.section6.list.item1: Texts, articles, descriptions, and editorial content
legal.section6.list.item2: Graphics, logos, icons, and graphic elements
legal.section6.list.item3: The general structure of the site, databases, and source codes
legal.section6.paragraph2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of all or part of the site's elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization from ArbiNote.
legal.section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
legal.section7.paragraph1: ArbiNote strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information. However, ArbiNote cannot guarantee:
legal.section7.list.item1: The accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of information published on the platform
legal.section7.list.item2: The absence of interruptions or technical errors that may affect site accessibility
legal.section7.list.item3: Absolute security of data transmitted over the Internet
legal.section8.title: 8. External Links
legal.section8.paragraph1: The ArbiNote website may contain links to other websites. ArbiNote exercises no control over these sites and disclaims any responsibility regarding their content, accessibility, or privacy policy.
legal.section8.paragraph2: Creating hypertext links to the ArbiNote website is permitted, provided that these links do not harm ArbiNote's image and that the source is clearly identified.
legal.footer: For any questions regarding this legal notice, you can contact us via the email address indicated above.
